description:
AJKI-02 EMBROIDERED TWILL 3 PC

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Self Twill Trouser: Self Twill Shawl: Self Twill Color: Purple

Step into a realm of royal sophistication with this striking purple ensemble. The shirt, intricately embroidered with vibrant threadwork in magenta, rust, green, and beige, showcases Kashmiri motifs and a beautiful foliage pattern that dances across the fabric. Complementing this beauty is a luxurious shawl that flows seamlessly, its embroidery creating a mesmerizing pattern that whispers of the enchanting landscapes of Kashmir.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front center panel on self twill
Embroidered front side panel left on self twill
Embroidered front side panel right on self twill
Embroidered border for front daman on self twill
Embroidered back with border on self twill
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on self twill
Embroidered border for front & back chaak on self twill
Embroidered shawl with 4-side border on self twill
1.5-meter wide width self twill for trouser
